name: orbistech
description: Politics and War alliance management system with web app and Discord bot

scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:bot
scripts.install:all: cd web && npm install && cd ../bot && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf web/node_modules web/.next bot/node_modules bot/dist shared/dist node_modules
scripts.type-check: cd web && npm run type-check && cd ../bot && tsc --noEmit
scripts.deploy:bot: echo 'Deploy bot to your preferred service (Railway, Render, etc.)'

author: DevCodeRift
